data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: My university works on the applications of biology, and  I am very interested in my projects on biological systems. And now my lab actually has the ability and power to design it. Biology is sort of the next level of genetic engineering. About 4 years ago, scientists and engineers at my university developed techniques to basically move pieces of DNA from one organism to another. And it was sort of done by physically cutting and pasting. As a result, we’re moving beyond that where we can write DNA, which means we’re no longer limited to the piece we can cut from one and put in another. We can chemically synthesize this DNA on a machine and put that into an organism, and now we can even create new organisms, completely from scratch. We plan to finish this project next month. And it will be very helpful to all humans. (150 words)
data.referenceText: What projects will you've finished by the end of next month?
data.referenceTranslate: 到下个月底你将完成哪些项目?
